Name: Islandville: A New Home
About the game: Set off on an exciting journey in search of new lands and untold treasures in a new time management game. The main characters, young Captain Jack and his wife, Mary, embark on a journey to discover new lands and wind up on a tropical island in the middle of the ocean. Now they have to settle on it and build their own town. But doing so isn't as easy as it seems because the island conceals a multitude of mysteries and secrets. Exotic plants, ancient temples, and surprising inhabitants are waiting for you! There's also sea, sun, and lots of fun! During your journey, you'll discover new territories, explore caves, and meet charismatic characters. Construct and improve buildings, create a sawmill, farm, mine, and collect resources. You choose what to build: a hut, house, or hotel. Build your own paradise on a tropical island! The game features: ✔ Conquer 60 fun and challenging levels. ✔ Choose between Expert, Normal and Relaxed modes. ✔ Never get lost with the integrated Strategy Guide. ✔ Follow the captivating story and meet the locals. ✔ Upgrade and improve your town, build homes and hotels for settlers. ✔ Find all the hidden pieces and complete the puzzle. ✔ Open chests and look for pirate treasure. ✔ Explore the island and discover new territories. ✔ Craft, grow, harvest, and solve puzzles. ✔ A casual time-management strategy game suitable for the whole family.
